mapper.select: select r.room_id as roomId, r.room_name as roomName, r.room_content as roomContent, rl.level_name as roomLevel, rt.type_name as roomType, r.room_status as roomStatus, r.is_used as isUsed, r.version as version from t_room as r left join t_room_level as rl on r.room_level = rl.room_level left join t_room_type as rt on r.room_type = rt.room_type
